item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, November 1, 2024 at 7:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple acquires Pixelmator (503 points | 278 comments)
2. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (November 2024) (171 points | 165 comments)
3. Alexander the Great's tunic identified in royal tomb at Vergina (205 points | 98 comments)
4. Notepad++ is 21 years old (108 points | 45 comments)
5. The Elimination Strategy – Why More Makes Your SaaS Worth Less (8 points | 2 comments)
6. Broadwell's EDRAM: VCache Before VCache Was Cool (24 points | 4 comments)
7. TokenFormer: Rethinking Transformer Scaling with Tokenized Model Parameters (86 points | 11 comments)
8. Make It Yourself (125 points | 16 comments)
9. Ink: React for Interactive CLI Apps (88 points | 60 comments)
10. The Shell Hater's Handbook (14 points | 3 comments)
11. Ubuntu Hoping to Remove Qt 5 Before Ubuntu 26.04 LTS (25 points | 13 comments)
12. Recursion, Tidy Stars, and Water Lilies (8 points | discuss)
13. Notes for an Annotation SDK (2021) (11 points | discuss)
14. An Update on Apple M1/M2 GPU Drivers (562 points | 230 comments)
15. Iceberg A-68: The story of how a mega-berg transformed the ocean (13 points | discuss)
16. The Dual Nature of Events in Event-Driven Architecture (39 points | 13 comments)
17. Oasis: A Universe in a Transformer (143 points | 59 comments)
18. Math and puzzle fans find magic in Martin Gardner's legacy (31 points | 9 comments)
19. 34x34x34 Rubik's Cube (161 points | 70 comments)
20. Implementing a Tiny CPU Rasterizer (10 points | 1 comment)
21. Show HN: I built PixSpeed to optimize website images for free (10 points | 5 comments)
22. Using Large Language Models to Catch Vulnerabilities (15 points | 2 comments)
23. Embeddings are underrated (256 points | 129 comments)
24. Show HN: Ratarmount 1.0.0 – Rapid access to large archives via a FUSE filesystem (49 points | 4 comments)
25. Throbac: THrifty Roman numeral BAckwards-looking Computer (11 points | 6 comments)
26. How China Is Like the 19th Century U.S. (44 points | 13 comments)
27. Pythagora (GPT Pilot) (YC W24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
28. A new dental scam is to pull healthy teeth to sell you expensive fake ones (252 points | 235 comments)
29. Using the Strangler Fig with Mobile Apps (45 points | 11 comments)
30. Iconic Gun-Makers Gave Sensitive Customer Information to Political Operatives (60 points | 51 comments)
